name: tm03
effect: Teaches Water Pulse to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Psyshock to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Water Pulse Gen II: Curse Gen I: Swords Dance)

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally’s attack.
